## Data Transformation


```{r Loading Data, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
df <- read_excel("C:/Users/wzj545/University of Copenhagen/KU/Research/WP4/Online Survey.xlsx")
```

## Speedy Removal Panelist
Removing panelist who finished the questionnaire under 2 minutes.

From the initial 214 

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr)


df2 <- df %>%
  mutate(
    start = as.POSIXct(Importance_of_coffee_variables_Prices_Time_Stamp * 86400, origin = "1899-12-30", tz = "Europe/Copenhagen"),
    end   = as.POSIXct(BMI_Height_Time_Stamp   * 86400, origin = "1899-12-30", tz = "Europe/Copenhagen"),
    time_taken_sec = as.numeric(difftime(end, start, units = "secs"))
  ) %>%
  filter(time_taken_sec > 2 * 60)

```
